SELECT c.`name` companyName, CASE acl.object_type WHEN 'ADCampaign' THEN (select CONCAT('$$$',u.username,'###',c.id,'###',t1.`name`,'###',t1.id,'$$$') from lt_ad_campaign t1 where t1.id = acl.object_id) WHEN 'ADGroup' THEN (select CONCAT('$$$',u.username,'###',c.id,'###',cam.`name`,'###',cam.id,'###',t2.`name`,'###',t2.id,'$$$') from lt_ad_group t2 inner join lt_ad_campaign cam on t2.campaign_id=cam.id where t2.id = acl.object_id) WHEN 'ADAdvertise' THEN (select t3.name from lt_ad_advertise t3 where t3.id = acl.object_id) WHEN 'ADAdvertiseFeed' THEN (select aa.name from lt_ad_advertise_feed aaf left join lt_ad_advertise aa on aaf.ad_advertise_id= aa.id where aaf.id = acl.object_id) WHEN 'ADAdvertiseVariation' THEN (select aa.name from lt_ad_advertise aa where aa.id = acl.object_id) ELSE NULL END objectName, acl.* FROM `lt_ad_change_log` acl LEFT JOIN lt_company c ON acl.company_id = c.id left join lt_user u on c.owner_id=u.id
acl.`status` = #{status}
AND c.`name` like '%${companyName}%'
order by acl.`status`,acl.priority desc, acl.update_time_utc desc, c.`name`
